mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_member (customer_id, customer_pwd, customer_name, customer_email, customer_birth, customer_phone) VALUES (#{customer_id}, #{customer_pwd}, #{customer_name}, #{customer_email}, #{customer_birth}, #{customer_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_member WHERE customer_id = #{customer_id} AND customer_pwd = #{customer_pwd}
